transcript: And last year I remember specifically you were so excited to go that you stubbed your toe rushing me out of the house and didn't even notice until we got in the car.

segments.text: And last year I remember specifically you were so excited to go that you stubbed your toe rushing me out of the house
and didn't even notice until we got in the car.
